      struct: {
        fields: {
          key:"name"
          value: {
            oneof: {
              options: {
                key:"H--6VaA31gw="
                value: {
                  primitive: {
                    string_value: {
                      value:"2020-01"
                    }
                    formats: {
                      key:"ISOYearMonth"
                      value:true
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
              options: {
                key:"PGYGe9fHTG4="
                value: {
                  primitive: {
                    int32_value: {
                      value:20200101
                    }
                    formats: {
                      key:"ISOYearMonthDay"
                      value:true
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
      meta: {
        http: {
          body: {
            content_type:JSON
          }
          response_code:200
